name: vonmea

comment: ` ( voln `` X ) ` is a measure on the space of multidimensional real numbers with dimension equal to the cardinality of the finite set ` X ` . Comments in Definition 115E of [Fremlin1] p. 31 . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Oct-2020.)
